folder: Bronx Park East & Lydig Avenue, Bronx, NY
text:
(1)
Bronx Park East, east side, south from Lydig to Brady Aves. On the left appears the elevated structure of the I.R.T. White Plains Road subway line, on White Plains Road.

July 27, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, as seen from the S.W. corner of Lydig Ave and White Plains Road.

July 27, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Bronx: Bronx Park East - Lydig Avenue

folder: White Plains Road & Lydig Avenue, Bronx, NY
original_title: Bronx: White Plains Road - Lydig Avenue
text:
White Plains Road, east side, between Lydig Ave. and Pelham Parkway South, showing the ruin of an old stone house on the former John Jacob Astor estate.

July 28, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.
